full_summary:
# Netropy products or equivalent

## Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Reference:** SSC-23-00022077:T
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** BPM018360/22077
- **Publication Date:** 2023-03-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-17T15:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-03-10

## Solicitation Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of Netropy WAN Emulation equipment or equivalent products to support the development of a consolidated and modernized tactical deployable capability. The equipment must enable the emulation of different WAN or bearer networks during the development and test phases of the project.

## Technical Requirements
The equipment should provide interoperability between deployed Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) personnel and other national and international partners. It must also support weapon system platforms, radars, tactical data link (TDL) and sensor data link networks.

## Procurement Method
This solicitation is competitive, open to all eligible suppliers. Suppliers must submit a proposal in response to this solicitation. The Netropy products or equivalent specified in this solicitation have been selected based on their technical functionalities corresponding to the specific requirements and test environment.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this solicitation is Shared Services Canada (SSC). The end-user entities for this procurement are the DND and SSC.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarification, please contact:
* Oliver Librada, (Email: [oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca), Phone: 343-542-8460).

## Attachments
Attachments to this solicitation include the Service Notice, Amendment 001, and other relevant documents which can be accessed at the following links:
* English: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/01A72BAF-16E2-402A-A290-D6A77DB35181](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/01A72BAF-16E2-402A-A290-D6A77DB35181)
* French: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/323
